name: Get Stripe Customer Portal Light
author: Netfox Software Co.

sections.description:
With Get Stripe Customer Portal Light WordPress plugin your customers can get email with a link to their Stripe Customer Portal. No styles are enforced, so you can style it to look whatever your want. This is the light version with non-customizable labels and messages. Upgrade to Pro version for more flexibility and features.

Features

  • Provides short code to be insterted anywhere on your site.

  • Test and live Stripe modes

    [get_stripe_customer_portal]

Support

In case of questions or issues, email us at: job@netfoxsoftware.com
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload the plugin into the plugins directory and then activate it.
  2. Go to Settings â†’ Stripe Portal Settings
  3. Set your Stripe’s secret key
  4. Add short code to your pages/posts/etc.

  • re-tagging ajax fix

1.1.1

  • Fixed ajax for non-logged in users

1.1.0

  • Switch to ajax
  • Add debugging option

1.0.0

  • Initial release
